nodes.text: An Advanced Recon Commando was a clone trooper who, along with several others, was given experimental Phase II clone trooper armor. His armor had red markings.
He was born on the aquatic Wild Space world of Kamino and was one of the millions of clones of Mandalorian bounty hunter Jango Fett and received ARC trooper training.

He was seen briefly during the Third Battle of Kamino, commanding a squadron of clone troopers, alongside Commander Havoc, in the main hangar bay to fire at an approaching platoon of Aqua droids and a Trident drill. He and Commander Blitz were the only two ARC troopers to survive the battle. He was later seen in the area where Echo and Fives got promoted to ARC troopers.
A LEGO version of this ARC trooper appears in the Lego Star Wars Set 9488 Elite Clone Trooper & Commando Droid Battle Pack.
It has been stated that this ARC trooper's name is Hammer, but this is yet to be confirmed.
